content.name: imger.txt
content.content: A small image processing library written in Go. Source code: github

content.name: delaunayimage.txt
content.content: DelaunayImage is tool which lets you generate artistic bitmap and/or vector graphic images using Delaunay triangulation algorithm. Source code: github

content.name: artistic_video_gui.txt
content.content: The project's goal was the develop a GUI application where the user can transfer the artistic style from well known pictures painted by hungarian artists to their chosen images\videos. Source code: github

content.name: coding.txt
content.content: I'm mostly interested in JVM languages like Java, Kotlin, etc. In the past I've done professionally C/C++ using MFC and Boost libraries. I'm not a big fan of dynamically typed languages, but I can get along with Javascript and Python. In my professional job/free time I've used extensively the following languages/frameworks: QT(C++ and PyQt), Android(using both Java and Kotlin), Angular(AngularJS as a full-stack developer at my current job, Angular2 and upwards in some private projects), Spring(extensive used in my current job, used in several home projects).

content.name: about.txt
content.content: My name is Ervin Szilagyi. I'm a software engineer currently working for Endava Romania as a full-stack developer. I have a bachelor's degree in computer science and a master's degree in software engineering, both from Sapientia Hungarian University of Transylvania. I'm interested in micro-services and computer security.
